instruction.en: For INCLUSION: press service button S your Dimmer for more than 2 seconds or press push button I1 three times within 3 seconds (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds). For EXCLUSION: press push button I1 five times within 3 seconds ( 5 times change switch state within 3 seconds) or if service button S is pressed more than 2 and less than 6 seconds.
instruction.nl: Voor TOEVOEGEN: houd de service knop S van je Dimmer langer dan 2 seconden ingedrukt of druk knop I1 3x binnen 3 seconden (verander de status van de knop 3x binnen 3 seconden). Voor VERWIJDEREN: druk knop I1 5x binnen 3 seconden (verander de status van de knop 5x binnen 3 seconden) of houd service button S meer dan 2 maar korter dan 6 seconden ingedrukt.

hint.en: By this parameter the user can set input based on device type. NOTE: After parameter change to value 3,4 or 5 first exclude module then wait at least 30s and then re include the module!

label.en: Automatic turning off output after set time

hint.en: 0 - Auto OFF disabled. 1 - 32535 = 1 second - 32535 seconds Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 1 second

label.en: Automatic turning on output after set time

hint.en: 0 - Auto ON disabled. 1 - 32535 = 1 second - 32535 seconds Auto ON enabled with define time, step is 1 second

label.en: State of device after power failure

hint.en: The parameter defines if the state of the device should be either saved or not in case of a power failure
The parameter defines the maximum dimming value. NOTE: The maximum level may not be lower than the minimum level!
The parameter defines the minimum dimming value. NOTE: The maximum level may not be lower than the minimum level!

Set value means time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max. dimming values by short press of push button I1 or controlled through UI. Default value is 100 (Dimming time between min. and max. dimming values is 1s). 1 - 255 = 10 mseconds - 2550 mseconds (2,55s), step is 10 mseconds
Time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max dimming values by continues hold of push button I1. 1- 255 = 1 second - 255 seconds

32536 - offset is 0.0 °C. From 1 to 100 - value from 0.1 °C to 10.0 °C is added to actual measured temperature. From 1001 to 1100 - value from -0.1 °C to -10.0 °C is subtracted to actual measured temperature.
Default value 5 = 0,5°C change. 0 - Reporting disabled. 1 - 127 = 0,1°C - 12,7°C, step is 0,1°C.

instruction.en: For INCLUSION: press service button S your Dimmer for more than 2 seconds or press push button I1 three times within 3 seconds (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds). For EXCLUSION: press push button I1 five times within 3 seconds ( 5 times change switch state within 3 seconds) or if service button S is pressed more than 2 and less than 6 seconds.

Voor VERWIJDEREN: druk knop I1 5x binnen 3 seconden (verander de status van de knop 5x binnen 3 seconden) of houd service button S meer dan 2 maar korter dan 6 seconden ingedrukt.

hint.en: By this parameter the user can set input based on device type
The parameter defines the contact type
The parameter defines the contact type

label.en: State of device after power failure

hint.en: The parameter defines if the state of the device should be either saved or not in case of a power failure
The parameter defines if a power report should be sent depending on the predefined power change in percent
A power report is sent based on the predefined time interval in seconds. 0 -> Function is disabled. Valuerange: 1 - 65535.
The parameter defines the maximum dimming value. NOTE: The maximum level may not be lower than the minimum level!
The parameter defines the minimum dimming value. NOTE: The maximum level may not be lower than the minimum level!

Set value means time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max. dimming values by short press of push button I1 or controlled through UI. Default value is 100 (Dimming time between min. and max. dimming values is 1s). 1 - 255 = 10 mseconds - 2550 mseconds (2,55s), step is 10 mseconds
Time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max dimming values by continues hold of push button I1. 1- 255 = 1 second - 255 seconds

instruction.en: For INCLUSION: press service button S your Dimmer for more than 2 seconds or press push button I1 three times within 3 seconds (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds). label.en: Module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system.

hint.en: 0,1,2,255 see manual
The parameter defines if a power report should be sent depending on the predefined power change in percent
A power report is sent based on the predefined time interval in seconds. 0 -> Function is disabled. Valuerange: 1 - 32767.

label.en: This parameter defines selection between two available operating modes. 0: Shutter mode and 1: Venetian mode (up/down and slate rotation)

hint.en: NOTE: When setting parameter, module needs to be excluded and included again! Please check detailed description in this manual.

label.en: This parameter defines the time necessary for slats to make full turn (180 degrees). default value 150 = 1,5 seconds. 0: Tilting time disabled - 1: 32767 = 0,01seconds - 327,67 seconds

hint.en: NOTE: If time set is too high, this will result that after full turn, shutter will start move up / down, for time remaining.

label.en: This parameter defines slats position after up/down movement through Z-wave or push-buttons. default value 1. 0: Slats return to previously set position only in case of Z-wave control ( not valid for limit switch positions ). 1: Slats return to previously set position in case of Z-wave control, push-button operation or when the lower limit switch is reached
This parameter defines shutter motor moving time of complete opening or complete closing

hint.en: 0 -> Function is disabled. Valuerange: 1 - 32767 = 0,1seconds - 3276,7seconds.

label.en: Power threshold to be interpreted when motor reach the limit switch

hint.en: NOTE: Motors with power consumption less than 0,5W could not be auto calibrated. In that case set time manually (par. 74)

label.en: By modifying the parameters setting from 0 to 1 a Shutter DC module enters the calibration mode

hint.en: 1 - Start calibration process (when calibration process is finished, completing full cycle - up, down and up, set the parameter 78 (Forced Shutter calibration) value back to 0

label.en: This parameter defines the max time before motor power consumption is read after one of the relays is switched ON. If there is no power consumption during this max time (motor not connected, damaged or requires higher time to start, motor in end position,...) the relay will switch OFF.

hint.en: default value 8 = 800ms. 3 - 50 = 0,3seconds - 5seconds (100ms resolution)

label.en: This parameter defines the max time at limit switch, when power consumption is below power threshold. If the power consumption during this time is below power threshold (par. 76)

hint.en: default value 8 = 800ms. 3 - 50 = 0,3seconds - 5seconds (100ms resolution)

label.en: This parameter defines the minimum time delay between next motor movement (minimum time between switching motor off and on again)

hint.en: default value 5 = 500ms.1 - 30 = 0,1seconds - 3seconds (100ms resolution)

label.en: Set value is added or subtracted to actual measured value by sensor

hint.en: See manual

label.en: If digital temperature sensor is connected, module reports measured temperature on temperature change defined by this parameter.

hint.en: 0 - Reporting disabled. 1-127 = 0,1°C - 12,7°C, step is 0,1°C
